text: Pahariwood is the name of a Kashmiri movie industry that is based in the city of Kotli. Pahari-Pothwari are the native tongues of the ethnic population of Kotli, Mirpur and other area of Azad Jammu and Kashmir. ==References== Category:Cinema of Pakistan Category:Kashmir Founder name is is Saleem Ahmed Qureshi this industry also work on Urdu English languages as well .
title: Pahariwood
